title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the perspective of Deshaun Watson getting suspended for the full NFL Season. Should Cleveland make a move for Jimmy G? Alabama HC Nick Saban calls in and discusses the future of College Football. Should the sport move to a relegation system? And Darius Rucker makes a bet with Fritzy. Could we see Todd on stage at one of Darius' next events

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
